sfr.title: SFR Unified Label
sfr.description: Centralization and harmonization of SFR product labels to improve data consistency. Implementation of unit tests and continuous integration with Jenkins/Docker.
sfr.impact: National deployment and improved data reliability

esg.title: ESG Climate Website
esg.description: Full development of a website displaying companies' climate impact. Backend for data collection and processing via web scraping and frontend for interactive visualization.
esg.impact: Clear visualization of climate impact for 50+ companies

superset.title: Superset Integration
superset.description: Integration of Superset to enable visualization and analysis of internal data. Automation and dashboard optimization to reduce report generation time.

alto.title: Alto Studio
alto.description: Development and optimization of an internal platform combining various tools for employees: data visualization, data analysis, Jupyter notebooks, VS Code online, ChatGPT integration, and data pipelines.
alto.impact: Improved data exploitation for internal teams

ia.title: Generative AI Music
ia.description: Development of a collaborative web app leveraging a generative AI model for interactive music creation. Collaboration with R&D teams on audio generation and mixing algorithms.

stayalive.title: StayAlive
stayalive.description: Android/iOS mobile app managing medical emergencies with geolocation and real-time alerts. Centralization and processing of user health data for prioritizing interventions.

acenstream.title: Acenstream
acenstream.description: Platform for distribution and sharing of multimedia content for internal teams. Rights management and optimized workflows for 200+ employees.

acensigne.title: Acensigne
acensigne.description: Internal secure e-signature tool with advanced cryptography. Intuitive interface and optimized workflow for business processes.

vrbaseball.title: VR Baseball
vrbaseball.description: Immersive virtual reality baseball game with Unity and C#. Multiplayer gameplay with realistic mechanics and interactive 3D environments.

rtype.title: R-Type
rtype.description: Networked multiplayer version of the R-Type game, developed with a modular C++ game engine and optimized UDP protocol.
